summary: The pantheon of Greek gods is having a moment in popular culture recently, from the new Kaos TV series to the video game Hades, and author Abigail Owen adding her own imagination to that moment with her latest, The Games Gods Play.  Come find out how Owen is putting her own spin on the tales […]
title: The Big Idea: Abigail Owen
